meanings.sent1: She was in a bitching mood all day.
meanings.sent2: The weather was so bitching that everyone was unhappy.
meanings.sent3: Her constant bitching about the food made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The bitching wind outside matched her sour mood.
meanings.sent5: The bitching noise from the construction site was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: He had a bitching expression on his face.
meanings.sent2: The customer's bitching tone made the waiter nervous.
meanings.sent3: Her bitching about the slow service was understandable.
meanings.sent4: The bitching look in his eyes warned others to stay away.
meanings.sent5: The bitching attitude of the boss affected the whole team negatively.

meanings.definition: Gossiping or talking negatively about someone
meanings.sent1: They were bitching about their coworker during lunch.
meanings.sent2: Stop bitching about others behind their backs.
meanings.sent3: She was caught bitching about her friend's outfit.
meanings.sent4: The group was bitching about the new student in class.
meanings.sent5: Bitching about others only spreads negativity.
